entity.name: Nikki Haley
entity.description: US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley

text:
@NikkiHaley If 50,000 dead is just a rainy day, how many need to die from #Coronavirus before it's upgraded to a "tropical storm"? How many dead Americans equals a "Hurricane"? 

At least then #WeThePeople can expect Trump to toss us some toilet paper.
